rules.name: No_Other_case_Related_to_parent_case
rules.label: No Other case Related to parent case

decisions.name: Decision_To_Check_Total_Document_Status
decisions.label: Decision To Check Total Document Status

formulas.name: FormForStatus
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Profile'), 'Non-clear Profile', IF(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Document') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Profile')) , 'Non-clear Document',IF( ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Refer to Credit') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Document')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Profile')), 'Refer to Credit',IF( ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Negative') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Refer to Credit')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Document')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Profile')),'Negative', IF( ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Failed') && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Negative')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Refer to Credit')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Document')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL({!loop_on_docs_0.RCU_Agency_Verification_Sub_Status__c}, 'Non-clear Profile')),'Failed','' )))))

value.stringValue: Journey of this loan Application is stopped as RCU case has been Rejected.
